abstract: French Laundry and the Restaurant at Meadowood remain the only Bay Area restaurants with three stars.
snippet: French Laundry and the Restaurant at Meadowood remain the only Bay Area restaurants with three stars.
lead_paragraph: In the Michelin Guide to San Francisco area restaurants and hotels for 2012, which will go on sale Thursday, the French Laundry and the Restaurant at Meadowood remain the only three-star restaurants in the Bay Area.

headline.main: 3 More San Francisco Restaurants Gain 2 Michelin Stars
